channel.title: Comments on: KeyboardAccess For IE
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: mio
item.dc:creator: mio
item.description: so you did got it up and running after all. if you ever get that firefox extension - let me know. i think this idea of yours is very handy. i miss it even more now when i became a laptoper.
item.content:encoded: so you did got it up and running after all. if you ever get that firefox extension – let me know. i think this idea of yours is very handy. i miss it even more now when i became a laptoper.
